recipes.recipeName: Corn & Chickpea Bowl with Miso-Jalapeño Tahini
recipes.description: A quick sear gives corn kernels caramelized edges and concentrated flavor. Here, they're cooked with crisp chickpeas, then tossed with za'atar and dressed with a mixture of ginger, jalapeños, miso, and tahini.

recipes.recipeName: Toast with Green Garlic Confit and Poached Eggs
recipes.description: Three ingredients but infinite possibilities. Keep this mellow garlic condiment on hand and add a spoonful to soups, sandwiches, or pretty much anything.

recipes.recipeName: Spicy Cauliflower Sabzi with Cashews panroasted
recipes.description: This would make an excellent and filling vegetarian main course (add a dollop of yogurt and some cooked rice, if you like). It would also be great alongside pan-roasted pork chops, hanger steak, or a firm-fleshed fish such as cod.

recipes.recipeName: Spiced Chickpeas with Crispy Pita, Yogurt, and Brown Butter
recipes.description: This version of the Levantine breakfast dish, known as fatteh hummus, is all about the contrast of textures and flavors: crunchy pita chips, creamy chickpeas, and tart yogurt.
